name: Pain-to-win
description:
Pain-to-win is a violent top-down-shooter about free-to-play contest in psychiatric-prison-hospital.

A lot of crazy maniacs, bloody killers, violent freaks and murderers gathered in one experimental prison-hospital to make some noise.
And you are here too. Maybe you are even worse than your opponents, maybe not... No one cares.
If you die – no one feels your pain.

Key features:
  • Tactical tricks - destructible environment, bouncing bullets, shooting through walls
  • Enemy hunters - they hear you, ambush you and try to fool
  • Weapons - melee, firearms, explosive, dual-wielding
  • Over 99 handcrafted levels
